# Remove Blindness/Deafness (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 332

*Remove blindness/deafness* cures blindness or deafness (your choice), whether the effect is normal or magical in nature. The spell does not restore ears or eyes that have been lost, but it repairs them if they are damaged.

*Remove blindness/deafness* counters and dispels *[[Blindness_Deafness (Spell)|blindness/deafness]]*.
